outline:
94 Ng1.1 mdo, ka 1b1-340a3 bskal 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po zhes bya theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya bad tra kal bi ka na ma ma hA yA na su trA 'phags pa skal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs s+ho // / rgya gar gy-i mkhan po b+h+yid dya ka ra sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban de dpal gy-i dbyangs ky-is bsgyurd / zhu chen gy-i lo tsa ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa // // 3.

ka 325b2-340a2 End of volume contains ye dharmā hetu formula: OM he d+har ma he du pra ba / he dun te shan ta thA ga to ha ba dad te shan tsa yo ni ro da e bAm ba ti ma ha sra ma na yA swa hA.
895 Ng2.1 mdo, kha 1b1-6a2 byams 'phags pa byams pa lung bstand pa a r+ya me'ai tre ya bya ka ra na ma 'phags pa byams pa lung bstand pa / rdzogs s+ho //
115 Ng2.2 mdo, kha 6a2-10a9 bde 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo' a r+ya su khA pa t-i byu ha na ma ma ha yA na su tra 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba / theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs s+ho //
856 Ng2.3 mdo, kha 10a9-11a7 rdo 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba A r+ya badzra d+hA dza pa ri nA ma na 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba / rdzogs s+ho //
502 Ng2.4 mdo, kha 11a7-36b7 bdun 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sab ta ta tha ga ta pU rba pra ti d+ha na pi she sha pi sta ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo brgyad brgya pa / rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan pa phab pa // //
The colophon in the Derge version mentions further Dānaśīla and Śīlendrabodhi as translators.
244 Ng2.5 mdo, kha 36b8-48a6 chos 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes ba ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo' A r+ya d+har ma ne tri nA ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes ba ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas pas bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan pa phab pa //
200 Ng2.6 mdo, kha 48a7-52b9 'jig 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' A r+ya lo ka nu pa rta nA nA ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs so // // / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab ba //
The colophon in the Derge version mentions further Dānaśīla as translator.
95 Ng2.7 mdo, kha 53a1-277a9 rgya 'phags pa rgya cher rold pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya la li ta bi sta ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa rgya cher rold pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs s+ho // // / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus ste / skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa / rdzogs s+ho //

102 Ng2.8 mdo, kha 277b1-328a3 zung 'phags pa zung gi mdo chos kyi rnam grangs a r+ya sang kh+had su dar ma ba rya yA 'phags pa zung gi gi mdo 'i chos kyi rnam grangs // // rdzogs s+ho // 1.
kha 277b1-291b6 2.
kha 291b7-305a4 3.
kha 305a4-328a3 End of volume contains ye dharmā hetu formula: ye dar ma he du prA b+ha bA / he dun te / shan ta tha ga to / hya bA dad te / shan tsa yo ni ro d+ha / E bAm ba ti ma ha sra mA na yE // swa hA // // // //. Further a short dedication: // swa sti / dad pa brtson 'grus ldan ba'-i yon dag stangs zhal gyis // hwa ltengs 'dzum du 'dzom ba'i mchod tsho spyan drangs nas // mdo' sde khyad du 'phags pa'i rin chen 'di bzhengs pas // yon mchod bla myed byang chub gom pang myur thob shog //.
216 Ng3.1 mdo, ga 1b1-58b5 dgra 'phags pa ma skyes dgra 'gyod pa bsal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' A r+ya a dzA ta sha tru ko'u krid tya pra ni bi no da na na ma ma ha ya na su tra rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bstsald pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs s+ho //
552 Ng3.2 mdo, ga 58b6-121b2 gser 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo' sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya su pra na pra b+ha sod ta ma su tre na dra rA tsa dzA na ma ma ha ya na su tra mdo' sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba / theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs s+ho //

ga 190b5 This version of the work differs from e.g. the Derge version, which contains altogether 25 chapters.
131 Ng3.4 mdo, ga 191b5-216a4 ye shes 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya ta thA ga ta gnya' na mu dra nA ma s d+hi ma ha yA na su tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'-i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dz-ind ces bya ba / theg pa chen po'i mdo' / / rdzogs s+ho //
132 Ng3.5 mdo, ga 216a5-281a2 dpa' 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'-i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'
'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'-i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
130 Ng3.6 mdo, ga 281a3-303a7 sgyu 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'-i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya ma yo pa ma sa ma d+hi na na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gi mkhan po su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gi lo ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing / zhus te gtan la phab pa //
137 Ng3.7 mdo, ga 303a8-313b1 dam 'phags pa ting nge 'dzind kyi mchog dam pa a r+ya sa ma d+hi a tra u ta ma 'phags pa ting nge 'dzind kyi mchog dam pa // rdzogs s+ho //
129 Ng3.8 mdo, ga 313b2-338a3 + nga 1b1-15a4 cho 'phrul 'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa cho 'phrul gi ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya pra shan ta pi nis tsa yA pra ti ha r+ya na ma sa ma d+hi ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa 'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg po 'i mdo // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
136 Ng4.1 mdo, nga 15a4-51a5 khye'u 'phags pa khye 'u bzhi 'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya tsa tur d+ha ra ka sa ma d+hir na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa khye'u bzhi'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho // // // rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / prad nya bar ma dang / zhu cen gy-i lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
127 Ng4.2 mdo, nga 51a5-221b7 rgyal 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam ba nyid rnam par spros pa'-i t-ing nge 'dzin kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo a r+ya sa rba d+har ma s+wa b+ha ba sa ma ta p-i pan ts-i ta sa ma ti ra dza na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gi rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho // // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po shi len dra bo de dang zhu chen gi lo tsha ba ban de dar ma ta shi las bsgyur cing zhus te / /skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa / 1.

156 Ng5.1 mdo, ca 1b1-44a9 ma dros 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' A r+ya A na ba tab ta na ga rA dza pa ri prid tsha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' /rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang da na shi la dang ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa // //
153 Ng5.2 mdo, ca 44b1-119b2 rgya mtsho 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya pa ra na gar rdzA pa ri pri tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi 'dra dang / prad nya par ma dang / lo tsa ba ban de yes shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa //

ca 115b4 Check: This is the longer version of the sūtra, D153, not the middle-length one, D154, or short one, D155. It is Lg5.4, but not Lg5.5, 5.15, 5.16. It is S135, but not S136.
154 Ng5.3 mdo, ca 119b2-126a1 rgya mtsho 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya sA gar nA ga ra dza pa ri pri tsa na ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //
Check: This is the middle-length version of the sūtra, that is, D154, S136, Lg5.5, Lg5.16.
172 Ng5.4 mdo, ca 126a2-130a3 'jam 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya man 'dzu shri ri pa ri prid tsha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho / /rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya par ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
Title differs slightly from Derge and other mainstream Kanjurs. Text differs considerably from Derge. The Derge version also does not provide information about agents in the colophon. Note further that the variant title is found in many Western Tibetan collections: Lg, He, Hi, X, Go, Th.
163 Ng5.5 mdo, ca 130a3-145b3 rin cen dra ba 'phags pa rin cen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya rad na dzA li pa ri prid tsha na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa rin cen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po gnya' na gar ba dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa //
The Derge version mentions Ye shes snying po instead of Ye shes sde as translator. Also He, X, and Lg have Ye shes sde.
158 Ng5.6 mdo, ca 145b3-153b8 tshangs 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya bra m+ha ba ri phrad tsA na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
151 Ng5.7 mdo, ca 153b8-166a2 spobs 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya pra ti b+hA na ma ti pra ri phrid tsha nA ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya bar dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las bstsogs pas / sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
150 Ng5.8 mdo, ca 166a2-166b5 chos bdun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya pa lo ki te sha ra pa ri prid tsa sab ta d+ha ma ka na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so // //rgya gar gi mkhan po di pang ka ra shri gnya' na dang / lo tsa ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur //
302 Ng5.9 mdo, ca 166b5-168a3 nye bar 'khor 'phags pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo
'phags pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so //
Check: No title in Skt. or Tib.; title taken from colophon. Work is not identical with rKTs68, D68, even though similar in title. The text is a version of rKTs302, D302, even though the title is entirely different. The same situation is found in Lg5.11.
149 Ng5.10 mdo, ca 168a3-168b4 byams 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya me tri pa ri prad ta na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho //
148 Ng5.11 mdo, ca 168b4-254b5 nam 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ga ga na ga na dza pa ri phrid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'dus pa chen po 'i le'u las 'phags pa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po ba dza ya shi la dang / su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gi lo tsha ba band de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar can kyis kyang bcos pa // 1.

154 Ng5.14 mdo, ca 259a2-265b5 mtsho 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya s+wa ga ra nA ga ra dza pa ri prid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags ba'i klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //
342 Ng5.15 mdo, ca 265b5-267a4 kun tu kun tu rgyu sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo dI rga na kha pa ri prA dzA ka pa ri phrid tshA na ma su tra kun tu rgyu sen rings kyis zhus ba zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd //
The Derge version does not provide any information on translators or revisors in its colophon.
164 Ng5.16 mdo, ca 267a4-270b9 khye'u 'phags pa khye'u rin cen zla bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya rad na tsan dra da ra ka pa ri prid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa kye'u rin cen zla bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho //
Seems to be a shorter version of rKTs164, D164. It differs not only in size, but also slightly in its title from the Derge version. The text itself differs greatly, but seems to be related. Similar versions are found in Lg5.18, He52.6, Hi54.2, F380, Go26.16.

170 Ng5.18 mdo, ca 279b1-282b3 bram 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya shri ma trI brA m+ha NI pa ri prid tsA nA ma ma hA yA nA su trA 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho //
171 Ng5.19 mdo, ca 282b3-286b9 'gres 'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya ma ha la li ka pa ri prid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban te ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
159 Ng5.20 mdo, ca 287a1-299a5 byin 'phags pa tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo A r+ya bra ma dad ta pa ri prid tsh+wa nA ma ma hrA yA na sru tra 'phags pa tshangs pas byin kyis / zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po su len tra bo dang / prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas / bsgyurd cing / zhus te gtan la phab pa // // dag go / dag go // //
End of volume contains dedication in small dbu can letters: kye lags / yul gyi snying po lung dur yul gyi dbus // // 'khar gyi dam pa skye mar rin chen mdzod / / skye ba rjes su dran ba'i lha seng stang gzhal gyis / / smon lam dbang gyis mkhas pa rnams dang mjal / / bod du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams glegs bam chen por bris / / yig 'bru sum cu bder gshegs spruld pa'i sku / / ma nor lugs dang mthun pa ya rabs rkyen tu rung / / de'i phyir na bcu gcig gom phang bgrod pa'o / / de 'dra'i chos ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o / / lung dur ba'i ma dpe de la mdzod //.

134 Ng6.4 mdo, cha 126a8-177a9 sred 'phags pa sred myed kyi bus zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya sa rba pun na sa mun tsa ya sa mI d+hi na ma ma ha ya na su trA 'phags pa sred med kyi bus zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // /rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang / shi len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban te ye shes sde las / bstsogs pa / bsgyur c-ing zhus te gtan la phab ba //
This work is also found in Hemis, Basgo, and Lang under the same Tibetan name. As an analysis of the text itself shows, it must be seen as a version of e.g. Derge 134, which also bears the same title in Sanskrit, but a different title in Tibetan.
166 Ng6.5 mdo, cha 177b1-181a3 yul 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya rA sta ba la na na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'-i theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
167 Ng6.6 mdo, cha 181a3-217a9 'phrul 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul ba'-i rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya bi kur ba Na rA dza pa ri prid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal pos zhus pa'i zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban te ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab ba //
157 Ng6.7 mdo, cha 217b1-278b9 ljon 'phags pa myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya dru ma ki na na ra ra tsa pa ri phrid tsa nA ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa myi 'am / ci'i rgyal po ljond pas zhus pa / zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho // //
146 Ng6.8 mdo, cha 279a1-336a6 rnam 'phrul 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'-i spyod yul gi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul ba' bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya bo d+hi sa tA go tsa ro pA ya bi sha ya bi ku rbi ta ni rde sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs gy-i yul rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'-i mdo rdzogs s+ho // // // / /rgya gar g-i mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba //

nya 77a1 No title in Skt; appears to be appended to preceding text; gap in chapter markings after Chapter 2; seems closely related to respective versions from Lang and Hemis; text not contained in Tshal pa and Them spangs ma, but found in He, X, Ba, Lg, EM.
262 Ng8.5 mdo, nya 77b4-161b5 lnga stong sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa bud da na ma tri ban tsa sho ra dza tu phan tsa sha sha ta sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa / /rdzogs s+ho //
273 Ng8.6 mdo, nya 161b5-165a2 sangs rgyas 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya d+wa da sha bud d+ha ka na na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho //
272 Ng8.7 mdo, nya 165a2-169b5 bcu sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo da sha bud da kan na ma ma ha ya na su tra sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho //
271 Ng8.8 mdo, nya 169b5-173a6 brgyad 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' A sh+ha bud d+ha ka na mA mA ha ya na su tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho //
638 Ng8.9 mdo, nya 173a6-174a3 kyil 'khor 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' A r+ya A sta man Da la ka na ma ma hA yan su tra 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho //
This must be distiguished from rKTs277, D277, which bears the same title.
105 Ng8.10 mdo, nya 174a4-175b7 chos kyi 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya a sh+Ta man Da la nA ma d+ha rma pa r+ya ya ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho //
278 Ng8.11 mdo, nya 175b8-177b7 dkra shis 'phags pa dkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya a s+ta mangga la ka na na ma mA hA ya na su tra 'phags pa dkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho //
269 Ng8.12 mdo, nya 177b7-183b9 'phags pa 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par seld pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya da sha dig ad d+ha ka ra pid d+ha na sa na na ma ma ha na su tra ma 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par seld pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho //
270 Ng8.13 mdo, nya 184a1-187b7 bdun pa 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sab ta bud d+ha kan na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho //
274 Ng8.14 mdo, nya 187b8-193b6 un brgyan 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbun rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' chos kyi rnam grangs chen po a r+ya bud d+ha ma ku tan ma ma ha ya na su tra na ma ha d+ha ra ma pa r+ya yan theg pa chen po'i shind tu brgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa sangs rgyas dbun rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /chos kyi rnam grangs chen po / /rdzogs s+ho //
266 Ng8.15 mdo, nya 193b6-227b6 me tog me tog gi tshogs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya ku su ma san tsa ya na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa me tog gi tshogs /rdzogs s+ho //
264 Ng8.16 mdo, nya 227b6-285a8 'gyod tshangs 'phags pa thard pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyi sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
'phags pa thard pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa zhes ba ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
98 Ng8.17 mdo, nya 285a8-306a4 zhing gi / bkod pa 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ky-i byin ky-i brlabs sems can la gz-igs shing sangs rgyas ky-i zhing gyi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sa rba ta tha ga ta A d+hi Sh+thA na sad t+wa a lo ka na bud d+ha k+She te san dar sha na b+yung ha nan ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin kyi rlabs sems can la gz-igs sh-ing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa kun tu stond pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'-i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzin na myi tra dang / su len tra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa / ban de klu'-i rgyal mtshan gy-is bsgyur //
114 Ng9.1 mdo, ta 1b1-16a6 chos 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'-i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya sa d+ha rma gu Na b+yung ha ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // // rdzogs s+ho // rgya gar gi mkhan po phrad nya bar ma dang / /su lend drA bo de dang / zhu chen gi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas / bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
204 Ng9.2 mdo, ta 16a6-27a3 mar mye 'phags pa mar me dbul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya pra dI pa dA ni yA na ma ma hA ya na su tra 'phags pa mar me dbul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po phrad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas sgyur cing zhus te / gtan la phab pa' //
104 Ng9.3 mdo, ta 27a3-28b1 yon tan 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnaM grangs a r+ya ta tha 'ga' ta nan bu d+ha k+she dra 'gu no d+ha b+hu ban da rma pa ra ya 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs // //rdzogs s+ho //
322 Ng9.4 mdo, ta 28b1-31b2 bsal gsal rgyal tshigs su bcad pa phra se na dzid ga thA gsal rgyal tshigs su bcad pa // //rdzogs s+ho// //
503 Ng9.5 mdo, ta 31b3-41b4 sman 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gi bla bye du rya'i 'od kyi sngon gi smon lam rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ba ga b+ha ta be sha tsa 'gu ru b+ye du r+ya pra ba s+ya phul bang pra ni da na b+yi pul l+ya na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bye du rya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd c-ing zhus te skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
195 Ng9.6 mdo, ta 41b5-56b7 spyan 'phags pa spyan ras gz-igs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya a ba lo ka nan na ma ma ha yA na su tra 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // // // rdzogs s+ho // // //rgya kar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te / skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas / gtan la phab pa' //
175 Ng9.7 mdo, ta 56b7-153b4 blo 'phags pa blo gros myi zad pas bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya a k+sha ya ma ti ni rde shA na ma ma ha yA na su tra 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'bum pa las / blo gros myi myi zad pas bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya kar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / lo tsa ba da na shi las bsgyur / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos shing gtan la phab // 1.

97 Ng11.6 mdo, da 201a3-217a7 rnam 'phrul 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya man dzu shri bi ku rbi ta ba ri ba rta na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / / rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi len dra bo de dang / 'dzi na myi tra dang / lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur / skad gsar chad kyis bcos // //

196 Ng11.8 mdo, da 218a3-223a3 gnas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya man 'dzu shri bi ha ra na ma ma ha yA na su tra 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes sgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
178 Ng11.9 mdo, da 223a3-226b8 phyogs 'phags pa byang chub kyi phyogs bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya bo d+hi ba k+sha nid de sha na ma ma hA ya na su tra 'phags pa byang chub kyi phyogs bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar can kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa / tsh-ig 'di thams cad la yang 'byung bar ba'o //

221 Ng12.6 mdo, na 276a7-282b5 rgyal po la 'phags pa rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya rA tsa a ba ba da ka na ma ma ha ya su tra 'phags pa rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
236 Ng12.7 mdo, na 282b6-305b3 gtsug bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug tor chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'i gsang ba bsgrub pa'i don mngon ba'i rgyu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo
'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor chen po'i stong phrag bcu pa las / gtsug tor chen po bdud gyi le'u / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa don mngon bar 'thob par spyod pa'i rgyu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt; the phrasing of the colophon differs significantly from e.g. the Derge version, but is found in a similar form in He and Lg.
283 Ng12.8 mdo, na 305b4-306b1 sku gsum 'phags pa sku gsum kyi theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ka ya tri na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa sku gsum theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //
248 Ng12.9 mdo, na 306b2-319a7 chos bzhi byang chub sems dpa'-i so sor thar pa chos bzhi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba' theg pa chen po'i mdo bo d+hi sad t+wa pra t-i mo k+sha tsa tur s+ka ha ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra byang chub sems dpa'-i so sor thar pa'-i chos bzhi bsgrub ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po tI pang ka ra shr-i gnya' na dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he shag kya blo gros kyis bsgyurd cing zhus //
The colophon of the Derge version further adds the translator Dge ba'i blo gros.
109 Ng12.10 mdo, na 319a8-326a6 ga ya ga ya mgo'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ga ya shir Sha nA ma ma hA ya nA su tra 'phags pa ga ya 'go'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gy-i mkhan po su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes sgyurd c-ing zhus te / gtan la phab pa //
240 Ng13.1 mdo, pa 1b1-64b5 phyir 'phags pa phyir myi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya a bAI ba rt+ya tsag kra na ma ma hA ya na su tra 'phags pa phyir myi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho //
209 Ng13.2 mdo, pa 64b6-69a1 seng 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra sgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sing ha nA di kan nA ma ma hA ya na su tra 'phags pa seng ge 'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho //
197 Ng13.3 mdo, pa 69a2-72a4 bdud 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya myid ta b+ya ha ra na na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho / /rgya gar gi mkhan po phrad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te btan la phab pa //
337 Ng13.4 mdo, pa 72a4-74a1 chos chos kyi 'khor lo 'i mdo da rma tsag krA su tra chos kyi 'khor lo 'i mdo rdzogs s+ho //
246 Ng13.5 mdo, pa 74a2-83a2 don 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo a r+ya ba ra mA r+tha d+ha rma bi dza ya na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa'i don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho //
144 Ng13.6 mdo, pa 83a3-111b2 dad 'phags pa theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ma hA yA na phra sa da pra b+ha na na ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa' theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu bsgom ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas zhus shing bris te gtan la phab pa //
mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o
pa 92b8 skye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o

106 Ng13.7 mdo, pa 111b3-162a8 dgongs 'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ar r+ya san d+hi ni mo tsa na na ma ha ya na su tra yon tan gyi tshogs rnam par gdon myi za pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho // 1.
pa 111b3-123b8 2.

pa 147b8-162a8 The text reflects an entirely different version of the work than it is transmitted e.g. in Derge.
190 Ng13.8 mdo, pa 162a9-185b1 bud 'phags pa bud myed 'gyur ba lung stand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya str-i bi bar ta b+ya ka ra nan na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa bud myed 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las s+cogs pas / bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// 1.
pa 162b1-173b9 2.
pa 174a1-185b1 The colophon of the Derge version further adds Śīlendrabodhi as translator.
191 Ng13.9 mdo, pa 185b2-203b7 zla 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya tsan drod da rA dA ri ka b+ya ka ra na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'-i mdo' rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa //
192 Ng13.10 mdo, pa 203b7-206a6 bde 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i mdo A r+ya k+sha mA ba ti b+yA ka ra nA Na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / rdzogs s+ho // //ba tsan zhus te gtan la phab pa //
A similar phrasing of the colophon is found in He.
188 Ng13.11 mdo, pa 206a7-214b4 mar me 'phags pa mar mye mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya d+w-i pang ka ra b+ya ka ra Na na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po b+yi shud d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban te dge dpal gyis bsgyur //
The colophon of the Derge version adds further Jñānagarbha and Klu'i rgyal mtshan as revisors.
189 Ng13.12 mdo, pa 214b5-216a5 khye'u tshangs pa 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya bra m+ha shri b+ya ka ra nan nA ma ma ha ya su tra 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po b+h-i shud d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban de dge dpal gyis sgyur //
The colophon of the Derge version adds further Vidyākarasiṃha and Devacandra as revisors.
357 Ng13.13 mdo, pa 216a5-226b7 glang ru 'phags pa gla ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya gro shing ga b+ya ka ra Na na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa glang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / rdzogs s+ho //
347 Ng13.14 mdo, pa 226b8-246a9 bsod bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa pun n+ya pa la A ba dA na bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs par brjod pa // rdzogs s+ho //
344 Ng13.15 mdo, pa 246b1-249a4 sangs rgyas 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gi mdo a r+ya dzan ka sru tra bud da a ba dA na 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi pa rtog par brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'di r+ya ka ra sing ga dang / sa rbad nya de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de dpal brtsegs gyis bsgyurd cing zhugs te gtan la phab pa //
1294 Ng13.16 mdo, pa 249a4-257a7 gzhon gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa sab ta ku mA ri ka a ba dA nam gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs par brjod pa / rdzogs s+ho // //slob dpon gsang bas byin gyis mdzad / sgyur ba'i dpe dang snga phyi phyir myi mthun pa dang / rgya gar gyi tshig gi don kha cig ma gsal ba / da rung yang bstan la dbab rgyu mchis //
This work by Guhyadatta is usually found in the Tanjur, e.g., D4147, rKTs-T3485. It is, however, also found in the sūtra collections of He, EM, and Lg.
349 Ng13.17 mdo, pa 257a7-276b2 dpal dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa shri se na a ba dA na rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rtogs par brjod pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po dar ma shri pa tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyur cing / / sgra sgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang po bcos te brtan la phab //
348 Ng13.18 mdo, pa 276b3-286a2 zla zla 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa tsan d+ha pra b+ha A da nam rgyal po zla 'od kyi rtog pa brjod pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po dar ma shri b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba shes rab legs pas sgyur cing zhus te / btan la phab pa //
The colophon of the Derge version adds further Rin chen bzang po as revisor.
346 Ng13.19 mdo, pa 286a2-293a7 mag ma ga da'i bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa a ma ga d+ha a ba da nam ma ga da bzang mo 'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har ma shri ba tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab po //
The colophon of the Derge version adds further Rin chen bzang po as revisor. Last folio of the text has space left for illuminations, but these are missing.
1127 Ng13.20 mdo, pa 293b1-349a8 gser gser mdog g-i rtogs pa brjod pa su bar na pa rna a ba da nam gser mdog g-i rtogs pa brjod pa /rdzogs s+ho // // // /rgya gar g-i mkhan po da rma shr-i ba dra dang / zhu chen gy-i lo tsa ba dge slong r-in cen bzang pos zhus te gtan la phab pa / zhu chen g-i lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyurd //
First folio of the text has space left for illuminations, but these are missing. In the colophon of the Stog version, the translator Shes rab legs pa is not mentioned.
1129 Ng14.1 mdo, pha 1b1-6b1 dga' ba 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa A r+ya d+ha ra na mi tra nA ma A ba da nam 'phags pa dga'-i bshes gnyen g-i rtogs par brjod pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar g-i mkhan po / dge slong a ts-i ta shr-i b+ha tra dang / dge slong shag kya 'od ky-is bsgyurd pa //
Title at the beginning is partly missing.
345 Ng14.2 mdo, pha 6b1-8a6 phag phag mo rtogs par brjod pa zhes bya ba'-i mdo sU ka r-i ba da sha su tra phag mo rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs s+ho //
Folio 7 is placed latter in the images.
1128 Ng14.3 mdo, pha 8a7-21a8 ku ku na la '-i rtogs pa brjod pa ku na la mu ba da nam ku na la '-i rtogs pa rjod pa rdzogs s+ho //
Folio 12 is placed latter in the images.
199 Ng14.4 mdo, pha 21a8-27b5 dga' 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnas su skye ba blangs pa'-i mdo
'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnas su skye ba blangs pa'-i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
182 Ng14.5 mdo, pha 27b6-45a5 sbyin 'phags pa sby-in pa'-i pha rold tu phy-ind pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po '-i mdo a r+ya da na pa ra my-i ta na ma ma hA ya na su tra 'phags pa sbyin ba'i pha rold tu pha rold tu phyind pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo //rdzogs s+ho // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba bad de ye shes sde las stogs pas bsgyurd cing / zhus te gtan la phab pa //
183 Ng14.6 mdo, pha 45a5-46b1 sbyin 'phags pa sbyin ba 'i legs pa a r+ya dA nA nu shang sa 'phags pa sbyin ba 'i legs pa rdzogs s+ho // //
The title of the work, but also the actual text differs slightly from e.g. the Derge version.
181 Ng14.7 mdo, pha 46b2-124a3 sbyin / tshul / bzod / brtson / bsaM 'phags pa pha rold tu phyind pa lnga bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ban tsa pa ra myi tha nir de sha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa pha rold tu phy-ind pa lnga bstand pa / theg pa chen po'i mdo / rdzogs s+ho // //rgya kar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus te rtan la phab pa // 1.

185 Ng14.9 mdo, pha 202b6-239a7 yon tan 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ta tha ga tha gu Nad gnya' na a tsid ta ba sha ya A ba ta ra nir de sha na ma mA ha ya na su tra 'phags pa de bzh-in gshegs pa'-i yon tan dang / ye shes sna bsam gis myi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstand pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po gnya' na gar ba dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa // 1.

103 Ng14.10 mdo, pha 239a7-250b1 snang ba 'phags pa snang ba bsam gis myi khyab pas bstand pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs a r+ya a tsin t+ya bra b+ha sa n-ir te sho na ma d+ha rma pa r+ya ya 'phags pa ye shes snang ba bsam gy-is my-i khyab pas bstand pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs s+ho // /
Title differs slightly from e.g. the Derge version. The same phrasing is also found in He, Lg, also Go, and F.
79 Ng14.11 mdo, pha 250b1-269a3 bsam pa 'phags pa sangs rgyas ky-i yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya a tsin t+ya bud d+ha bi sha ya nir de sha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gy-is myi khyab pa bstand pa zhes bya ba / /theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur / skad gsar chad kyis kyang gtan la phab //
62 Ng14.12 mdo, pha 269a3-300a3 pho brang pho brang 'khor skyong zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ra sta pa la ma ha ya na su tra bsod nams ky-i 'od gser skyes bu dam pa'i sngon gyi tshul bshad pa'i mdo sde / /dkon mchog 'phags pa pho brang 'khor skyong gyis yongs su gsol ba zhes bya ba / /theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // 1.
pha 269a4-289b4 2.
pha 289b4-300a3 Here, not only the title, but also the text reflects a completely different version of the sūtra; the same title is also found in Lg15.4, further also F296 and O137.
142 Ng15.1 mdo, ba 1b1-6b1 my-i rtog 'phags pa rnam par my-i rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'-i gzungs a r+ya a b+y-i kal+d pa pra b+ye sha na ma da ra n-i 'phags pa rnam par my-i rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dz-i na myi tra dang / lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus //
The colophon of the Derge version points to different translators: Jinamitra, Dānaśīla, and Ska ba Dpal brtsegs. There are also slight differences on the textual level. The colophons of He and Lg concur with Ng.
238 Ng15.2 mdo, ba 6b2-103a1 chos sdud 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya d+ha rma sang gi te na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo las rtsom ba myed kyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs s+h+yo // // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po man 'dzu shri gar ba dang / bi dza ya shi la dang / shi len dra po de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de yes shes sdes bsgyur c-ing zhus te / skad gsar cad gis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
176 Ng15.3 mdo, ba 103a2-168b1 dr-i ma 'phags pa dri ma myed par grags pas bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya b-i ma la k-ir te nir te sha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa dr-i ma myed par grags pas bstand pa phrugs su 'breld pa / phy-ir bzlog pa bsgrub pa bsam gyis my-i khyab pa '-i theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // 1.

ba 112a5 nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' gtang bar dris pa'i le'u ste gsum mo
ba 126a2 na bar dga' bar bya ba'i le'u ste bzh-i pa'o

ba 168a9 Phrasing of the title in the colophon and also of individual chapter names differs from e.g. Derge. There are also major differences on the textual level. The same phrasing of the title is found in Lg.
252 Ng15.4 mdo, ba 168b2-176b6 bzhi 'phags pa bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya tsa tu sh+ka n-ir ha ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa bzh-i pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / / rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar kyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na sh-i la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur c-ing zhus te skad gsar chad ky-is kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
The Derge version does not provide any information on translators in its colophon.
186 Ng15.5 mdo, ba 176b7-190b2 stobs 'phags pa sangs rgyas ky-i stobs bskyed pa'-i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo a r+ya bud d+ha ba la da na prA t-i hA r+ya 'bi ku rba na ni ra d+he sha na ma ma ha ya na su tra sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // // rdzogs s+ho //
275 Ng15.6 mdo, ba 190b2-199a4 sangs rgyas kyi sa 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya bud d+ha b+hu mi nA ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dz-i na myi tra dang / shi len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur c-ing / zhus nas gtan la phab pa //
The Derge version further adds Prajñāvarman as translator. Lg concurs with Ng.
210 Ng15.7 mdo, ba 199a5-207a3 sa lu 'phags pa sa lu'i ljang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'-i mdo a r+ya shi la stam ba stam ba na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa sa lu ljang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
284 Ng15.8 mdo, ba 207a4-226b4 phung 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'-i mdo' a r+ya tri skan d+ha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po su lend dra bo de dang / lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur / skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos //
The colophon in the Derge version does not provide information on translators and revisors.
297 Ng15.9 mdo, ba 226b4-231a8 khams khams mang po'i mdo' ba hu da tu ka su tra khams mang po pa zhes bya ba'-i mdo'i rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gi mkhan po su len dra bod de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing gtan la phab pa //
The colophon in the Derge version does not provide information on translators and revisors.
219 Ng15.10 mdo, ba 231a8-241b1 sgrib 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya ka rma a pa ra na pra ti sra pa d+h-i ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa las ky-i sgrib pa'-i rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dz-i na my-i tra dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
The colophon in the Derge version further adds Dānaśīla as one of the translators.
227 Ng15.11 mdo, ba 241b1-253a7 'thag 'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sa rba be'i dal l+ya sang gra hA na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dz-i na myi tra dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
The colophon in the Derge version further adds Munivarman as one of the translators.
218 Ng15.12 mdo, ba 253a8-267b7 dag 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya kar ma a ba ra Na b+yi shud d+hi n+ha ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa las kyi sgrib rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba / theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dz-i na myi tra dang / prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa //
179 Ng15.13 mdo, ba 267b7-290a4 bden 'phags pa bden pa gny-is la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya sad da d+wa ya a ba ta ra n-ir de sha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / / rdzogs s+ho // 1.
ba 267b7-276b4 2.
ba 276b4-290a4 The Derge version of the sūtra shows differences in the title as well as on the textual level. The title found in Ng concurs with Lg, further F210.
169 Ng15.14 mdo, ba 290a5-339a8 man 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya mA hA yA no pa de sha na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dz-i na myi tra dang / da na sh-i la dang / ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab //

226 Ng19.6 mdo, dza 249b3-251a7 'pho 'phags pa srid pa 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya pA ba sang kran di na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa'-i srid pa 'pho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // // rgya kar kyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te / gtan la phab pa'o //
1126 Ng19.7 mdo, dza 251a7-308a5 las las ky-i tshul bshad pa kar ma prad nya ba t-i las kyi tshul bshad pa gsum pa / rdzogs s+ho //
Note that this work is titled las gdags pa in some collections, e.g., S286, T283, while others list it as las kyi tshul bshad pa, e.g., He75.2, Lg20.9, also Ta1.4.3.3.
1124 Ng20.1 mdo, wa 1b1-96b1 gzhag 'jig rten bzhag pa lo ka prad nya pa ti 'jig rten bzhag pa rdzogs s+ho //
851 Ng20.2 mdo, wa 96b1-99a1 rgyal rgyal bu kun tu dge' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
rgyal bu kun du dge zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
358 Ng20.3 mdo, wa 99a1-142a9 stag rta rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa sa r+du la ka ra na ka ba da na 'phags pa stag rna'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho // /rgya gar gi mkhan po dge slong a dza ta sri ba ta dang / zhu chen gi lo tsha ba dge slong sha kya 'od gis bsgyur //
359 Ng20.4 mdo, wa 142a9-146a9 stag dmyig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo d+wa d+ha sha lo tsa na su tra dmyig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
1134 Ng20.5 mdo, wa 146a9-161a4 stag thub pa chen po drang srong gar bas ltas gi rnam pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag
thub pa chen po drang srong gar ba ltas gi gtsug lag / rma bya ltar sna tshogs bstand pa zhes bya ba'i las ji snyed pa // // rdzogs s+ho //

wa 161a3 No title in Skt.
921 Ng20.6 mdo, wa 161a5-178b9 stag a r+ya pya ka kar rna'i nang nas 'byung ba gza' dang rgyu skar gi rang bzhin bshad pa
a r+ya sha ru la gar rna 'i nang nas gza' skar gyi ltas 'byung ba btus pa ltas dang mtshan ma dge bar rgyurd cing rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
922 Ng20.7 mdo, wa 179a1-188a1 stag zla ba'i khyim rtsi ba dang rgyu skar rtsi ba'i cho ga mdo sde las byung ba zla ba'i khyim rts-i ba
stag rna dang lo rgyus su bcas pa rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.

338 Ng22.1 mdo, za 1b1-19b8 las las rnam par 'byed pa kar ma b+yi bang ga las rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan pa phab pa'o //
The colophon in e.g. Derge does not provide any information on translators or revisors.
354 Ng22.2 mdo, za 19b9-27a4 legs nyes 'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstand pa zhes bya ba'-i mdo'
'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstand pa zhes bya ba'-i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
307 Ng22.3 mdo, za 27a5-33b6 tshe tshe mtha'i mdo' a yu pa r+yad ta su tram tshe mtha'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po b+yi shud dA si ha dang / lo tsa ba ban de dge' dpal gyis bsgyurd //
The colophon in Derge adds further Vidyākarasiṃha and Dpal brtsegs as revisors.
333 Ng22.4 mdo, za 33b6-38a3 gnas 'phags pa gnas 'jog ces bya ba'i mdo'
'phags pa gnas 'jog ces bya ba'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
314 Ng22.5 mdo, za 38a3-43b2 mun mun kyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'-i mdo'
mun gyi nags tshal gi sgo' zhes bya ba'-i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // //byang phyogs rgyud kyi 'phreng ba'-i mdo' / khri pa'i nang nas yul za len dra'i byang phyogs ky-i sa 'tshams kyi ri u shu ri'i bsngags pa'o //
No title in Skt.
320 Ng22.6 mdo, za 43b3-45a8 gzugs 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs a r+ya ta tha ga tA pra ti bim pa pra ti sh+wa a nu shang sa sam ba rna na na mA d+ha rma pa r+ya yA 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs // rdzogs s+ho // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dar ma ka ra dang / lo tsa ba ban de ye shes snying pos bsgyurd //
The colophon in Derge adds further Dpal brtsegs as revisor.
332 Ng22.7 mdo, za 45a8-48b6 khang khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo' ku ta a ka ra su tra khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo' // // rdzogs s+ho //
298 Ng22.8 mdo, za 48b6-51a3 'gan de 'gan 'de 'i mdo' 'gan 'di su tra 'gan 'de'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po d+ha rma shri bad tra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyurd / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge' slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyurd te gtan la phab pa //
299 Ng22.9 mdo, za 51a3-52a3 'gan de 'gan de'i dus kyi mdo' 'gan de sa ma ya su tra 'phags pa 'gan de'i dus kyi mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
128 Ng22.10 mdo, za 52a4-55b9 'dul chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid las my-i g.yo' bar tha dad par thams cad la snang ba'-i mdo'
chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo' bar tha dad par thams cad la snang ba'-i mdo' // // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po da na shi la dang / ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
No title in Skt.
331 Ng22.11 mdo, za 56a1-56a9 'da' ka zla ba'-i mdo' tsan tra su tra zla ba'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
This must be differentiated from another sūtra with the same title, rKTs42, D42.
303 Ng22.12 mdo, za 56a9-57a6 'da' ka tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo' shi la s+ha ga sha ta ka su tra tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
122 Ng22.13 mdo, za 57a6-57b6 'da' ka 'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'-i mdo' a r+ya a ta gnya' na na ma 'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes bya ba'i / /theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
309 Ng22.14 mdo, za 57b6-58a8 'da' ka myi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo'
myi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt. or Tibetan; title taken from colophon. This work must be differentiated from rKTs310, D310, which bears the same title.
1387 Ng22.15 mdo, za 58a8-59a4 'da' ka 'phags pa sdug bsngal brgyad sbyong ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'
'phags pa sdug bsngal brgyad sbyong ba zhes bya ba / theg pa chen po'i mdo' / rdzogs sho //
No title in Skt. or Tibetan; title taken from colophon. Text not identified in mainstream traditions, but identical with He78.16 and Lg29.21.
194 Ng22.16 mdo, za 59a5-59b5 rgyal 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba'-i theg pa chen po'i mdo' A r+ya dzA yA mar tir na ma ma hA ya na su tra 'phags pa rgyal ba'-i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
890 Ng22.17 mdo, za 59b5-60a3 'du bstan 'du shes bcu bstand pa'i mdo' da sha sang ngid nir de sha su tra 'du shes bcu bstand pa'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
249 Ng22.18 mdo, za 60a3-60b4 'du bstan 'phags pa chos bzhi bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya tsa tur da rma nir te shan na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos bzh-i bstond pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
250 Ng22.19 mdo, za 60b5-61a7 chos bzhi pa 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya tsa tur da rma ka na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
251 Ng22.20 mdo, za 61a7-61b7 chos bzhi pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' dar rma tsa tur na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg po'i chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho// // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes kyis sgyurd cing zhus //
The colophon in Derge does not provide any information on translators or revisors.
324 Ng22.21 mdo, za 61b7-62a3 tshigs bden tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa tsa tur ga ta tshigs su bcad pa bzhi' pa rdzogs s+ho //
316 Ng22.22 mdo, za 62a3-62b7 tshigs bden 'phags pa bden pa bzhi'i mdo' a r+ya 'phags pa'i bden pa'i bzhi'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
253 Ng22.23 mdo, za 62b7-63b6 chos chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo' tri d+ha rma ka na ma su tra chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
282 Ng22.24 mdo, za 63b7-64a3 bslab sum bslab pa gsum gyi mdo'
bslab pa gsum pa'i mdo' rdzogs s+hO //
No title in Skt.
304 Ng22.25 mdo, za 64a4-66b6 ltung ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba myi dge ba'i 'bras su brtag pa'-i mdo' pan tsa prad ti ni ka ya shu b+hA shu b+hA pal pa ri k+Ta su TraM ltung ba sde lnga'-i dge ba dang myi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo' // // rdzogs s+ho //
327 Ng22.26 mdo, za 66b6-67b8 skyes bu 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo' a r+ya sad bu ru Sha su tra 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'-i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
330 Ng22.27 mdo, za 67b8-68b3 lha lha'-i mdo' nyung ngu spal ba de ba ta su tra lha'i mdo' nyung ngu // rdzogs s+ho //
329 Ng22.28 mdo, za 68b3-70a1 lha lha'i mdo' de ba ta su tra lha'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
205 Ng22.29 mdo, za 70a2-71b6 grong 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya na ga na ra a ba la lam bi kA na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
352 Ng22.30 mdo, za 71b6-87b1 dra tshangs pa'i dra ba'-i mdo
tshangs pa'i dra ba // rdzogs so //
No title in Skt.
211 Ng22.31 mdo, za 87b1-89a3 rten brtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba'-i dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstand pa zhes bya ba'i mdo' pri tid tya sa mud pA dA sa a din tsa bi b+hang ga ni rde sha na na ma su tra brtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
296 Ng22.32 mdo, za 89a4-90b6 gzhon nu gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo' ku ma ra tri shan tu su tra gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
245 Ng22.33 mdo, za 90b7-96a5 chos kyi 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pe chen po'i mdo' a r+ya d+ha rma skan d+ho na na ma ma ha ya su tra 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // // / /rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya par ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes bsdes bsgyurd cing gtan pa phab pa //
325 Ng22.34 mdo, za 96a5-100a6 klu'i klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa na ga ra tsa d+ha ra ga tha klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra tshigs su bcad pa // //rdzogs s+ho //
217 Ng22.35 mdo, za 100a6-115b7 dpal 'phags pa dpal sbas shes bya ba'i mdo' a r+ya shri gu pa ta na ma su tra 'phags pa dpal sbas zhes bya ba'-i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
276 Ng22.36 mdo, za 115b8-120b9 sangs rgyas 'phags pa sangs rgyas myi spong ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya bud d+ha k+shE bAn nA ma ha ya nA sU tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas myi spong ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
351 Ng22.37 mdo, za 121a1-135b4 rgyal 'phags pa rgyal bu don grub kyi mdo'
'phags pa rgyal bu don 'grub ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
301 Ng22.38 mdo, za 135b5-256a5 mngon mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo a b+hi ni sgra ma na su tra mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // // // // lo tsa ba dge slong rin cen bzang pos sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
The colophon in Derge adds further Dharmaśrībhadra as translator.
225 Ng22.39 mdo, za 256a6-257b2 skyabs 'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i mdo a r+ya dri sha na ga ma na ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i mdo // // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po sa rbad gnya' de ba dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
328 Ng22.40 mdo, za 257b3-260a4 dga' dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo' nan da pra bra dz+ya su tra dga' bo rab tu byung ba'-i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
1131 Ng22.41 mdo, za 260a5-268b2 gnas gnas brtan spyan drang ba stha bi ro ba ni man tra na gnas brtan spyan drang ba rdzogs s+ho // //a tsa r+ya 'dz-i na myi tra dang / ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pha pa //
306 Ng22.42 mdo, za 268b3-280b5 bslab pa rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba bi mug ti mAr ge d+tu ta gu na nEr dE shO mA nA rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstand pa zhes bya ba ste // kun nas btus pa gsum pa'o // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'di d+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ban de dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
Note that this version of the work is substantially longer and textually different from e.g. the Derge version.
965 Ng22.43 mdo, za 280b5-295a8 me'u 'phags pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen pos ma dmyal khams nas drangs pa bshad pa'-i mdo a r+ya ra ba pu tra b+ha bi na rag a 'gu sha slU tra 'phags pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen pos ma dmyal khams nas drangs pa'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //
This work is not included in mainstream collections, but found also in Lg and He, further also Ne and O.
309 Ng22.44 mdo, za 295a8-296a1 myi rtag pa myi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo a ni t+ya trA sU trA myi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo' rdzogs s+ho //
This work must be distinguished from rKTs310, D310, which bears the same title.
279 Ng22.45 mdo, za 296a1-296b2 sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa a r+ya bud d+ha a nu smri te 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa / /rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus pa //
The colophon in the Derge version does not provide any information on translators or revisors.
121 Ng22.46 mdo, za 296b2-298a9 mya ngan 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo ma ha pa ri ni ra pa na su tra 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po ka ma la kub ta dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba dge slong rin cen bzang pos bsgyurd //
This is the short version of the sūtra, which must be distinguished from the long version, rKTs119, D119, and the middle-length version, rKTs120, D120.
947 Ng22.47 mdo, za 298a9-302a7 chos dran dam pa'-i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa sad d+ha rma smrid du pa sh+thA na ka ri ka dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //
This work is also found in Lg and He, further also Gondhla, Go25,11. In the mainstream collections this is placed in the Tanjur, e.g., D4179, Q5679.
319 Ng22.48 mdo, za 302a7-305a6 rmad 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs a r+ya ad b+hu ta d+ha rma pa r+ya ya na ma 'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs // rdzogs s+ho //
918 Ng22.49 mdo, za 305a6-306a6 tshul khrims 'phags pa tshul khrims nyams pa'i rnam par smyind pa lci yang bstand pa'i mdo'
tshul khrims nyams pa'i rnam par smyind pa lci yang bstand pa'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
321 Ng22.50 mdo, za 306a6-308b4 mchod rten mchod rten bskor ba tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba ts+ye ta pra d+ha k+Shi na na ma g+ha tha mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa // //rdzogs s+ho //
310 Ng22.51 mdo, za 308b5-310a8 myi rtag myi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo' a nid t+ya ta su tra my-i rtag pa nyid kyi mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // // // / /rgya gar gi mkhan po ka ma la kub ta dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te / / gtan la phab pa //
This work must be distinguished from rKTs309, D309, which bears the same title. The colophon in Derge does not provide any information on translators and revisors.
335 Ng22.52 mdo, za 310a8-313b1 khar sil 'phags pa la khar sil gi mdo'
'phags pa khar s-il g-i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
336 Ng22.53 mdo, za 313b1-314a7 khar sil khar sil bcang ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga
khar sil gi mdo dang cho ga 'di zhu chen kyi lo tsha ba ban de chos grub ky-is / brgya'i dpe' las bsgyurd cing gtan la phab pa // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt. The colophon in Derge does not provide any information on translators and revisors.
334 Ng22.54 mdo, za 314a7-317a5 dga' ba can 'phags pa dga' ba can gyi mdo a r+ya nan di ka su tra 'phags pa dga' ba can kyi mdo' // rdzogs so // //rgya gar gi mkhan po shag kya sing ha dang / lo tsa ban de byin gyis snying pos bsgyur // ban de de ba tsan tras gtan la phab pa //
206 Ng22.55 mdo, za 317a5-318b7 zas kyis 'tsho ba zas kyi 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa theg pa chen po'i mdo'
mtsho ba rnam par dag pa'i mdo' // // rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
820 Ng22.56 mdo, za 318b8-320a2 kra shis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa mang ga la ga thA bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
This is the same work as D826 or D1103, further also He65.15, He73.02, and Lg19.3. It must be distinguished from Ng22.57 and Ng22.60, which bear the same title, but are different works.
820 Ng22.57 mdo, za 320a2-321b6 bkra shis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa mang ga la ga thA bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so // //
The identification is problematic as this work bears the same title, but is actually different from D826 and D1103. It concurs with He65.16 and Lg19.4.
816 Ng22.58 mdo, za 321b6-322a3 bkra shis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa pan tsa ta thA ga ta mang ga la ga thA de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa // rdzogs so //
818 Ng22.59 mdo, za 322a3-9 bkra shis dkon mchog gsum gi bde legs tshigs su bcad pa rad na tra ya s+wa sti ga thA dkon mchog gsum gi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / shi len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
This identification is problematic. While the title is similar, this works does not concur with D824 or D827 and D1108, with the latter two being identical, but different from D824. It concurs with S331a and S332, but not S763. Further with He45.3, He61.10, He75.06, He79.11. Lg19.6 has a similar title but the text is different.
820 Ng22.60 mdo, za 322a9-323a3 bkra shis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa mang ga la ga thA bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho //
This identification is problematic as this work bears the same title, but is actually different from D826 and D1103. It concurs with He65.19 and Lg19.8.
811 Ng22.61 mdo, za 323a3-324b4 bde legs bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa s+wa sti ga thA bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
The colophon in Derge does not provide any information on translators or revisors.
812 Ng22.62 mdo, za 324b5-325a5 bkra shis bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa swa sti ya na gA thA bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa // rdzogs s+ho //
855 Ng22.63 mdo, za 325a5-327a6 dkra shis shis pa brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba
shis pa brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba // rdzogs s+ho //
Text appended to He65.21. No title in Skt. or Tib.; title taken from colophon. Besides Lg19.9, this concurs also with F239, but is not found in mainstream collections.

290 Ng26.3 mdo, la 147a4-150b3 stong pa mdo sde chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba shUn n+ya tA nA ma ma ha sU tram mdo chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba // // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
